overview: When Andrey was 12 years old he could easily hang on a basketball hoop. When he was 14 he could not fit into the photo. Now he is 22 years old and 207 cm height. Being tall is always a trouble. But being tall is not the main trouble of Andrey.

production_companies.name: Kyiv National I. K. Karpenko-Karyi Theatre, Cinema and Television University

title: It Was Showering In Manchester
